test_execution_default.preamble: Run comprehensive test suite including unit, integration, and E2E tests. Generate coverage report, identify failures, and provide detailed test results with recommendations.

quality_check_default.preamble: Execute quality checks including code linting, style validation, and best practices review. Identify issues by severity, provide fixes where applicable, and generate quality report.

compliance_validation_default.preamble: Verify compliance with specified standards, regulations, and policies. Document violations, assess risk levels, and provide remediation steps with priority ordering.

schema_validation_default.preamble: Validate data structures against defined schemas. Report violations with location and severity. Suggest corrections and verify data integrity constraints.

accessibility_check_default.preamble: Conduct accessibility audit following WCAG guidelines. Identify violations by impact level, provide remediation code, and generate accessibility score with detailed report.
